translations: 敦促，催促，力劝；竭力主张，强烈要求；驱赶，鞭策；鼓励，激励（~ sb. on）
强烈的欲望，冲动；推动力

sentences.sentence: He denounces people who urge him to alter his ways.
sentences.translation: 他指责那些敦促他改变习惯的人们。

sentences.sentence: I had a sudden urge to hit him.
The urge to survive drove them on.
sentences.translation: 求生的欲望驱使他们继续下去。
